description.full: NBA ELITE 11 includes all new gameplay featuring Hands-On Control, giving unprecedented control with 1 to 1 movement and all-new Real Physics. All-new features include the Become Legendary – Be A Pro mode , online EA SPORTS Basketball Association, ESPN broadcast package including new commentary from Mike Breen, Mark Jackson, and Jeff Van Gundy, revamped Dynasty Mode, updated Dynamic DNA/Dynamic Season, and much more.
